{{flavour|A magical device which speeds up the actions of a targeted creature.}}

==Useful Info==
A '''wand of hasting''' inflicts the [[Haste]] status on the user or a target, making all actions take 2/3rds as long. It causes some [[magical contamination]] as you are hasted.

It can hold at most 9 charges.

==Strategy==
Haste is a very powerful buff. Hasting yourself will help in just about any sticky situation, and let you win fights you otherwise wouldn't. Unless you're in a serious emergency, don't be hasted for too long (more than 2 zaps), or you'll be inflicted with dangerous contamination levels.

When players could still learn the [[Haste]] spell, the wand of hasting allowed you to speed yourself up without any skill investment. Even for those with the spell, wands of hasting can be used during [[silence]].

It can also be used to speed up your own [[allies]], though charges of this wand are fairly scare.

== History ==
*Wands of hasting were removed in [[0.20]].
